Variable.Name: ACADVER
Variable.Comment: The AutoCAD drawing database version number.

Variable.Name: ACADMAINTVER
Variable.Comment: Maintenance version number (should be ignored).

Variable.Name: ACADMAINTVER
Variable.Comment: Maintenance version number (should be ignored).

Variable.Name: DWGCODEPAGE
Variable.Comment: Drawing code page; set to the system code page when a new drawing is created, but not otherwise maintained by AutoCAD.

Variable.Name: LASTSAVEDBY
Variable.Comment: Name of the last user to modify the file.

Variable.Name: INSBASE
Variable.Comment: Insertion base set by BASE command (in WCS).

Variable.Name: EXTMIN
Variable.Comment: X, Y, and Z drawing extents lower-left corner (in WCS).

Variable.Name: EXTMAX
Variable.Comment: X, Y, and Z drawing extents upper-right corner (in WCS).

Variable.Name: LIMMIN
Variable.Comment: XY drawing limits lower-left corner (in WCS).

Variable.Name: LIMMAX
Variable.Comment: XY drawing limits upper-right corner (in WCS).

Variable.Name: ORTHOMODE
Variable.Comment: Ortho mode on.

Variable.Name: REGENMODE
Variable.Comment: REGENAUTO mode on.

Variable.Name: FILLMODE
Variable.Comment: Fill mode on.

Variable.Name: QTEXTMODE
Variable.Comment: Quick text mode on.

Variable.Name: MIRRTEXT
Variable.Comment: Mirror text.

Variable.Name: DRAGMODE
Variable.Comment: Controls the way dragged objects are displayed.

Variable.Name: LTSCALE
Variable.Comment: Global line type scale.

Variable.Name: OSMODE
Variable.Comment: Running object snap modes.

Flag.Name: CenterSnap
Flag.Comment: Snap to circle and arc center points.

Variable.Name: ATTMODE
Variable.Comment: Attribute visibility.

Variable.Name: TEXTSIZE
Variable.Comment: Default text height.

Variable.Name: TRACEWID
Variable.Comment: Default trace width.

Variable.Name: TEXTSTYLE
Variable.Comment: Current text style name.

Variable.Name: CLAYER
Variable.Comment: Current layer name.

Variable.Name: CELTYPE
Variable.Comment: Entity line type name, or BYBLOCK or BYLAYER.

Variable.Name: CECOLOR
Variable.Comment: Current entity color.

Variable.Name: CELTSCALE
Variable.Comment: Current entity line type scale.

Variable.Name: DELOBJ
Variable.Comment: Controls object deletion.

Variable.Name: DISPSILH
Variable.Comment: Controls the display of silhouette curves of body objects in wireframe mode.

Variable.Name: DRAGVS
Variable.Comment: Hard-pointer ID to visual style when creating 3D solid primitives.

Variable.Name: DIMSCALE
Variable.Comment: Overall dimensioning scale factor.

Variable.Name: DIMASZ
Variable.Comment: Dimensioning arrow size.

Variable.Name: DIMEXO
Variable.Comment: Extension line offset.

Variable.Name: DIMDLI
Variable.Comment: Dimension line increment.

Variable.Name: DIMRND
Variable.Comment: Rounding value for dimension distances.

Variable.Name: DIMDLE
Variable.Comment: Dimension line extension.

Variable.Name: DIMEXE
Variable.Comment: Extension line extension.

Variable.Name: DIMTP
Variable.Comment: Plus tolerance.

Variable.Name: DIMTM
Variable.Comment: Minus tolerance.

Variable.Name: DIMTXT
Variable.Comment: Dimensioning text height.

Variable.Name: DIMCEN
Variable.Comment: Size of center mark/lines.

Variable.Name: DIMTSZ
Variable.Comment: Dimensioning tick size.

Variable.Name: DIMTOL
Variable.Comment: Dimension tolerances generated.

Variable.Name: DIMLIM
Variable.Comment: Dimension limits generated.

Variable.Name: DIMTIH
Variable.Comment: Text inside horizontal.

Variable.Name: DIMTOH
Variable.Comment: Text outside horizontal.

Variable.Name: DIMSE1
Variable.Comment: Suppression of first extension line.

Variable.Name: DIMSE2
Variable.Comment: Suppression of second extension line.

Variable.Name: DIMTAD
Variable.Comment: Text above dimension line.

Variable.Name: DIMZIN
Variable.Comment: Controls suppression of zeros for primary unit values.

Variable.Name: DIMBLK
Variable.Comment: Arrow block name.

Variable.Name: DIMASO
Variable.Comment: Controls associative dimensioning.

Variable.Name: DIMSHO
Variable.Comment: Recompute dimensions while dragging.

Variable.Name: DIMPOST
Variable.Comment: General dimensioning suffix.

Variable.Name: DIMAPOST
Variable.Comment: Alternate dimensioning suffix.

Variable.Name: DIMALT
Variable.Comment: Alternate unit dimensioning performed.

Variable.Name: DIMALTD
Variable.Comment: Alternate unit decimal places.

Variable.Name: DIMALTF
Variable.Comment: Alternate unit scale factor.

Variable.Name: DIMLFAC
Variable.Comment: Linear measurements scale factor.

Variable.Name: DIMTOFL
Variable.Comment: If text is outside extensions, force line extensions between extensions.

Variable.Name: DIMTVP
Variable.Comment: Text vertical position.

Variable.Name: DIMTIX
Variable.Comment: Force text inside extensions.

Variable.Name: DIMSOXD
Variable.Comment: Suppress outside-extensions dimension lines.

Variable.Name: DIMSAH
Variable.Comment: Use separate arrow blocks.

Variable.Name: DIMBLK1
Variable.Comment: First arrow block name.

Variable.Name: DIMBLK2
Variable.Comment: Second arrow block name.

Variable.Name: DIMSTYLE
Variable.Comment: Dimension style name.

Variable.Name: DIMCLRD
Variable.Comment: Dimension line color.

Variable.Name: DIMCLRE
Variable.Comment: Dimension extension line color.

Variable.Name: DIMCLRT
Variable.Comment: Dimension text color.

Variable.Name: DIMTFAC
Variable.Comment: Dimension tolerance display factor.

Variable.Name: DIMGAP
Variable.Comment: Dimension line gap.

Variable.Name: DIMJUST
Variable.Comment: Horizontal dimension text position.

Variable.Name: DIMSD1
Variable.Comment: Suppression of first extension line.

Variable.Name: DIMSD2
Variable.Comment: Suppression of second extension line.

Variable.Name: DIMTOLJ
Variable.Comment: Vertical justification for tolerance values.

Variable.Name: DIMTZIN
Variable.Comment: Controls suppression of zeros for tolerance values.

Variable.Name: DIMALTZ
Variable.Comment: Controls suppression of zeros for alternate unit dimension values.

Variable.Name: DIMALTTZ
Variable.Comment: Controls suppression of zeros for alternate tolerance values.

Variable.Name: DIMFIT
Variable.Comment: Placement of text and arrowheads.

Variable.Name: DIMUPT
Variable.Comment: Cursor functionality for user-positioned text.

Variable.Name: DIMUNIT
Variable.Comment: Units format for all dimension style family members except angular.

Variable.Name: DIMDEC
Variable.Comment: Number of decimal places for the tolerance values of a primary units dimension.

Variable.Name: DIMTDEC
Variable.Comment: Number of decimal places to display the tolerance values.

Variable.Name: DIMALTU
Variable.Comment: Units format for alternate units of all dimension style family members except angular.

Variable.Name: DIMALTTD
Variable.Comment: Number of decimal places for tolerance values of an alternate units dimension.

Variable.Name: DIMTXSTY
Variable.Comment: Dimension text style.

Variable.Name: DIMAUNIT
Variable.Comment: Angle format for angular dimensions.

Variable.Name: DIMADEC
Variable.Comment: Number of precision places displayed in angular dimensions.

Variable.Name: DIMALTRND
Variable.Comment: Determines rounding of alternate units.

Variable.Name: DIMAZIN
Variable.Comment: Controls suppression of zeros for angular dimensions.

Variable.Name: DIMDSEP
Variable.Comment: Single-character decimal separator used when creating dimensions whose unit format is decimal.

Variable.Name: DIMATFIT
Variable.Comment: Controls dimension text and arrow placement when space is not sufficient to place both within the extension lines.

Variable.Name: DIMFRAC
Variable.Comment: Sets the fraction format when DIMLUNIT is set to Architectural or Fractional.

Variable.Name: DIMLDRBLK
Variable.Comment: Arrow block name for leaders.

Variable.Name: DIMLUNIT
Variable.Comment: Sets units for all dimension types except angular.

Variable.Name: DIMLWD
Variable.Comment: Dimension line lineweight.

Variable.Name: DIMLWE
Variable.Comment: Extension line lineweight.

Variable.Name: DIMTMOVE
Variable.Comment: Dimension text movement rules.

Variable.Name: DIMFXL
Variable.Comment: Sets the total length of the extension lines starting from the dimension line toward the dimension origin.

Variable.Name: DIMFXLON
Variable.Comment: Controls whether extension lines are set to a fixed length.

Variable.Name: DIMJOGANG
Variable.Comment: Determines the angle of the transverse segment of the dimension line in a jogged radius dimension.

Variable.Name: DIMTFILL
Variable.Comment: Controls the background of dimension text.

Variable.Name: DIMTFILLCLR
Variable.Comment: Sets the color for the text background in dimensions.

Variable.Name: DIMARCSYM
Variable.Comment: Controls the display of the arc symbol in an arc length dimension.

Variable.Name: DIMLTYPE
Variable.Comment: Sets the line type of the dimension line.

Variable.Name: DIMLTEX1
Variable.Comment: Sets the line type of the first extension line.

Variable.Name: DIMLTEX2
Variable.Comment: Sets the line type of the second extension line.

Variable.Name: DIMTXTDIRECTION
Variable.Comment: Specifies the reading direction of the dimension text.

Variable.Name: LUNITS
Variable.Comment: Units format for coordinates and distances.

Variable.Name: LUPREC
Variable.Comment: Units precision for coordinates and distances.

Variable.Name: SKETCHINC
Variable.Comment: Sketch record increment.

Variable.Name: FILLETRAD
Variable.Comment: Fillet radius.

Variable.Name: AUNITS
Variable.Comment: Units format for angles.

Variable.Name: AUPREC
Variable.Comment: Units precision for angles.

Variable.Name: MENU
Variable.Comment: Name of menu file.

Variable.Name: ELEVATION
Variable.Comment: Current elevation set by ELEV command.

Variable.Name: PELEVATION
Variable.Comment: Current paper space elevation.

Variable.Name: THICKNESS
Variable.Comment: Current thickness set by ELEV command.

Variable.Name: LIMCHECK
Variable.Comment: Limits checking.

Variable.Name: BLIPMODE
Variable.Comment: Display blips for click locations.

Variable.Name: CHAMFERA
Variable.Comment: First chamfer distance.

Variable.Name: CHAMFERB
Variable.Comment: Second chamfer distance.

Variable.Name: CHAMFERC
Variable.Comment: Chamfer length.

Variable.Name: CHAMFERD
Variable.Comment: Chamfer angle.

Variable.Name: SKPOLY
Variable.Comment: Controls polyline sketch mode.

Variable.Name: TDCREATE
Variable.Comment: Local date/time of drawing creation.

Variable.Name: TDUCREATE
Variable.Comment: Universal date/time the drawing was created.

Variable.Name: TDUPDATE
Variable.Comment: Local date/time of last drawing update.

Variable.Name: TDUUPDATE
Variable.Comment: Universal date/time of the last update/save.

Variable.Name: TDINDWG
Variable.Comment: Cumulative editing time for this drawing.

Variable.Name: TDUSRTIMER
Variable.Comment: User-elapsed timer.

Variable.Name: USRTIMER
Variable.Comment: User timer on.

Variable.Name: ANGBASE
Variable.Comment: Angle 0 direction.

Variable.Name: ANGDIR
Variable.Comment: Angle directions.

Variable.Name: PDMODE
Variable.Comment: Point display mode.

Variable.Name: PDSIZE
Variable.Comment: Point display size.

Variable.Name: PLINEWID
Variable.Comment: Default polyline width.

Variable.Name: COORDS
Variable.Comment: Controls the display of coordinates.

Variable.Name: SPLFRAME
Variable.Comment: Controls the display of helixes and smoothed mesh objects.

Variable.Name: SPLINETYPE
Variable.Comment: Spline curve type for PEDIT Spline.

Variable.Name: SPLINESEGS
Variable.Comment: Number of line segments per spline hatch.

Variable.Name: ATTDIA
Variable.Comment: Controls whether the INSERT command uses a dialog box for attribute value entry.

Variable.Name: ATTREQ
Variable.Comment: Controls whether INSERT uses default attribute settings during insertion of blocks.

Variable.Name: HANDLING
Variable.Comment: Handles available.

Variable.Name: HANDSEED
Variable.Comment: Next available handle.

Variable.Name: SURFTAB1
Variable.Comment: Number of mesh tabulations in first direction.

Variable.Name: SURFTAB2
Variable.Comment: Number of mesh tabulations in second direction.

Variable.Name: SURFTYPE
Variable.Comment: Surface type for PEDIT Smooth.

Variable.Name: SURFU
Variable.Comment: Surface density (for PEDIT Smooth) in M direction.

Variable.Name: SURFV
Variable.Comment: Surface density (for PEDIT Smooth) in N direction.

Variable.Name: UCSBASE
Variable.Comment: Name of the UCS that defines the origin and orientation of orthographic UCS settings.

Variable.Name: UCSNAME
Variable.Comment: Name of current UCS.

Variable.Name: UCSORG
Variable.Comment: Origin of current UCS (in WCS).

Variable.Name: UCSXDIR
Variable.Comment: Direction of the current UCS X axis (in WCS).

Variable.Name: UCSYDIR
Variable.Comment: Direction of the current UCS Y axis (in WCS).

Variable.Name: UCSORTHOREF
Variable.Comment: If model space UCS is orthographic (UCSORTHOVIEW not equal to 0), this is the name of the UCS that the orthographic UCS is relative to. If blank, UCS is relative to WORLD.

Variable.Name: UCSORTHOVIEW
Variable.Comment: Orthographic view type of model space UCS.

Variable.Name: UCSORGTOP
Variable.Comment: Point which becomes the new UCS origin after changing model space UCS to TOP when UCSBASE is set to WORLD.

Variable.Name: UCSORGBOTTOM
Variable.Comment: Point which becomes the new UCS origin after changing model space UCS to BOTTOM when UCSBASE is set to WORLD.

Variable.Name: UCSORGLEFT
Variable.Comment: Point which becomes the new UCS origin after changing model space UCS to LEFT when UCSBASE is set to WORLD.

Variable.Name: UCSORGRIGHT
Variable.Comment: Point which becomes the new UCS origin after changing model space UCS to RIGHT when UCSBASE is set to WORLD.

Variable.Name: UCSORGFRONT
Variable.Comment: Point which becomes the new UCS origin after changing model space UCS to FRONT when UCSBASE is set to WORLD.

Variable.Name: UCSORGBACK
Variable.Comment: Point which becomes the new UCS origin after changing model space UCS to BACK when UCSBASE is set to WORLD.

Variable.Name: PUCSBASE
Variable.Comment: Name of the UCS that defines the origin and orientation of orthographics UCS settings (paper space only).

Variable.Name: PUCSNAME
Variable.Comment: Current paper space UCS name.

Variable.Name: PUCSORG
Variable.Comment: Current paper space UCS origin.

Variable.Name: PUCSXDIR
Variable.Comment: Current paper space UCS X axis.

Variable.Name: PUCSYDIR
Variable.Comment: Current paper space UCS Y axis.

Variable.Name: PUCSORTHOREF
Variable.Comment: If paper space UCS is orthographic (PUCSORTHOVIEW not equal to 0), this is the name of the UCS that the orthographic UCS is relative to. If blank, UCS is relative to WORLD.

Variable.Name: PUCSORTHOVIEW
Variable.Comment: Orthographic view type of paper space UCS.

Variable.Name: PUCSORGTOP
Variable.Comment: Point which becomes the new UCS origin after changing paper space UCS to TOP when PUCSBASE is set to WORLD.

Variable.Name: PUCSORGBOTTOM
Variable.Comment: Point which becomes the new UCS origin after changing paper space UCS to BOTTOM when PUCSBASE is set to WORLD.

Variable.Name: PUCSORGLEFT
Variable.Comment: Point which becomes the new UCS origin after changing paper space UCS to LEFT when PUCSBASE is set to WORLD.

Variable.Name: PUCSORGRIGHT
Variable.Comment: Point which becomes the new UCS origin after changing paper space UCS to RIGHT when PUCSBASE is set to WORLD.

Variable.Name: PUCSORGFRONT
Variable.Comment: Point which becomes the new UCS origin after changing paper space UCS to FRONT when PUCSBASE is set to WORLD.

Variable.Name: PUCSORGBACK
Variable.Comment: Point which becomes the new UCS origin after changing paper space UCS to BACK when PUCSBASE is set to WORLD.

Variable.Name: USERI1
Variable.Comment: Integer variable intended for use by third-party developers.

Variable.Name: USERI2
Variable.Comment: Integer variable intended for use by third-party developers.

Variable.Name: USERI3
Variable.Comment: Integer variable intended for use by third-party developers.

Variable.Name: USERI4
Variable.Comment: Integer variable intended for use by third-party developers.

Variable.Name: USERI5
Variable.Comment: Integer variable intended for use by third-party developers.

Variable.Name: USERR1
Variable.Comment: Real variable indented for use by third-party developers.

Variable.Name: USERR2
Variable.Comment: Real variable indented for use by third-party developers.

Variable.Name: USERR3
Variable.Comment: Real variable indented for use by third-party developers.

Variable.Name: USERR4
Variable.Comment: Real variable indented for use by third-party developers.

Variable.Name: USERR5
Variable.Comment: Real variable indented for use by third-party developers.

Variable.Name: WORLDVIEW
Variable.Comment: Set UCS to WCS during DVIEW/VPOINT.

Variable.Name: SHADEDGE
Variable.Comment: Controls shading of faces.

Variable.Name: SHADEDIF
Variable.Comment: Percent ambient/diffuse light; range 1-100.

Variable.Name: TILEMODE
Variable.Comment: Use previous release compatibility mode.

Variable.Name: MAXACTVP
Variable.Comment: Sets the maximum number of viewports to be regenerated.

Variable.Name: PINSBASE
Variable.Comment: Paper space insertion base point.

Variable.Name: PLIMCHECK
Variable.Comment: Limits checking in paper space.

Variable.Name: PEXTMIN
Variable.Comment: Minimum X, Y, and Z extents for paper space.

Variable.Name: PEXTMAX
Variable.Comment: Maximum X, Y, and Z extents for paper space.

Variable.Name: PLIMMIN
Variable.Comment: Minimum X and Y limits in paper space.

Variable.Name: PLIMMAX
Variable.Comment: Maximum X and Y limits in paper space.

Variable.Name: UNITMODE
Variable.Comment: Display fractions, feet-and-inches, and surveyor's angles in input format.

Variable.Name: VISRETAIN
Variable.Comment: Retain xref-dependent visibility settings.

Variable.Name: PLINEGEN
Variable.Comment: Governs the generation of line type patterns around the vertices of a 2D polyline.

Variable.Name: PSLTSCALE
Variable.Comment: Controls paper space line type scaling.

Variable.Name: TREEDEPTH
Variable.Comment: Specifies the maximum depth of the spatial index.

Variable.Name: PICKSTYLE
Variable.Comment: Controls the group selection and associative hatch selection.

Variable.Name: CMLSTYLE
Variable.Comment: Current multiline style name.

Variable.Name: CMLSTYLE
Variable.Comment: Current multiline style name.

Variable.Name: CMLJUST
Variable.Comment: Current multiline justification.

Variable.Name: CMLSCALE
Variable.Comment: Current multiline scale.

Variable.Name: PROXYGRAPHICS
Variable.Comment: Controls the saving of proxy object images.

Variable.Name: MEASUREMENT
Variable.Comment: Sets drawing units.

Variable.Name: CELWEIGHT
Variable.Comment: Lineweight of new objects.

Variable.Name: ENDCAPS
Variable.Comment: Lineweight endcaps setting for new objects.

Variable.Name: JOINSTYLE
Variable.Comment: Lineweight join setting for new objects.

Variable.Name: LWDISPLAY
Variable.Comment: Controls the display of lineweights on the Model or Layout tab.

Variable.Name: INSUNITS
Variable.Comment: Default drawing units for AutoCAD DesignCenter blocks.

Variable.Name: HYPERLINKBASE
Variable.Comment: Path for all relative hyperlinks in the drawing. If null, the drawing path is used.

Variable.Name: STYLESHEET
Variable.Comment: Path to the stylesheet for the drawing.

Variable.Name: XEDIT
Variable.Comment: Controls whether the current drawing can be edited in-place when being referenced by another drawing.

Variable.Name: CEPSNID
Variable.Comment: PlotStyle handle of new objects.

Variable.Name: CEPSNTYPE
Variable.Comment: Plot style of new objects.

Variable.Name: PSTYLEMODE
Variable.Comment: Indicates whether the current drawing is in a Color-Dependent or Named Plot Style mode.

Variable.Name: FINGERPRINTGUID
Variable.Comment: Set at creation time, uniquely identifies a particular drawing.

Variable.Name: VERSIONGUID
Variable.Comment: Uniquely identifies a particular version of a drawing. Updated when the drawing is modified.

Variable.Name: EXTNAMES
Variable.Comment: Controls symbol table naming.

Variable.Name: PSVPSCALE
Variable.Comment: View scale factor for new viewports.

Variable.Name: OLESTARTUP
Variable.Comment: Controls whether the source application of an embedded OLE object loads when plotting.

Variable.Name: SORTENTS
Variable.Comment: Controls the object sorting methods; accessible from the Options dialog box User Preferences tab.

Flag.Name: SortObjectsForMSlide
Flag.Comment: Sorts for MSLIDE command slide creation.

Variable.Name: INDEXCTL
Variable.Comment: Controls whether layer and spatial indexes are created and saved in drawing files.

Variable.Name: HIDETEXT
Variable.Comment: Ignore text objects.

Variable.Name: HIDETEXT
Variable.Comment: Ignore text objects.

Variable.Name: XCLIPFRAME
Variable.Comment: Controls the visibility of xref clipping boundaries.

Variable.Name: XCLIPFRAME
Variable.Comment: Controls the visibility of xref clipping boundaries.

Variable.Name: HALOGAP
Variable.Comment: Specifies a gap to be displayed where an object is hidden by another object; the value is specified as a percent of one unit and is independent of the zoom level. A haloed line is shortened at the point where it is hidden when HIDE or the Hidden option of SHADEMODE is used.

Variable.Name: OBSCOLOR
Variable.Comment: Specifies the color of obscured lines. An obscured line is a hidden line made visible by changing its color and line type and is visible only when the HIDE or SHADEMODE command is used. The OBSCUREDCOLOR setting is visible only if the OBSCUREDLTYPE is turned ON by setting it to a value other than 0.

Variable.Name: OBSLTYPE
Variable.Comment: Specifies the line type of obscured lines. Obscured line types are independent of zoom level, unlike regular AutoCAD line types. Value 0 turns off display of obscured lines and is the default.

Variable.Name: INTERSECTIONDISPLAY
Variable.Comment: Specifies the display of intersection polylines.

Variable.Name: INTERSECTIONDISPLAY
Variable.Comment: Specifies the display of intersection polylines.

Variable.Name: INTERSECTIONCOLOR
Variable.Comment: Specifies the entity color of intersection polylines.

Variable.Name: DIMASSOC
Variable.Comment: Controls the associativity of dimension objects.

Variable.Name: PROJECTNAME
Variable.Comment: Assigns a project name to the current drawing. Used when an external reference or image is not found on its original path. The project name points to a section in the registry that can contain one or more search paths for each project name defined. Project names and their search directories are created from the Files tab of the Options dialog box.

Variable.Name: CAMERADISPLAY
Variable.Comment: Turns the display of camera objects on or off.

Variable.Name: LENSLENGTH
Variable.Comment: Stores the length of the lens in millimeters used in perspective viewing.

Variable.Name: CAMERAHEIGHT
Variable.Comment: Specifies the default height for new camera objects.

Variable.Name: STEPSPERSEC
Variable.Comment: Specifies the number of steps taken per second when you are in walk or fly mode.

Variable.Name: STEPSIZE
Variable.Comment: Specifies the size of each step when in walk or fly mode, in drawing units.

Variable.Name: 3DDWFPREC
Variable.Comment: Controls the precision of 3D DWF or 3D DWFx publishing.

Variable.Name: PSOLWIDTH
Variable.Comment: Controls the default width for a swept solid object created with the POLYSOLID command.

Variable.Name: PSOLHEIGHT
Variable.Comment: Controls the default height for a swept solid object created with the POLYSOLID command.

Variable.Name: LOFTANG1
Variable.Comment: Sets the draft angle through the first cross section in a loft operation.

Variable.Name: LOFTANG2
Variable.Comment: Sets the draft angle through the second cross section in a loft operation.

Variable.Name: LOFTMAG1
Variable.Comment: Sets the magnitude of the draft angle through the first cross section in a loft operation.

Variable.Name: LOFTMAG2
Variable.Comment: Sets the magnitude of the draft angle through the second cross section in a loft operation.

Variable.Name: LOFTPARAM
Variable.Comment: Controls the shape of lofted solids and surfaces.

Flag.Name: NoTwist
Flag.Comment: No twist (minimizes the twist between cross sections).

Flag.Name: AlignDirection
Flag.Comment: Align direction (aligns the start to end direction of each cross section curve).

Flag.Name: Simplify
Flag.Comment: Simplify (produces simple solids and surfaces, such as a cylinder or plane, instead of spline solids and surfaces).

Flag.Name: Close
Flag.Comment: Close (closes the surface or solid between the first and the last cross sections).

Variable.Name: LOFTNORMALS
Variable.Comment: Controls the normals of a lofted object where it passes through cross sections.

Variable.Name: LATITUDE
Variable.Comment: The latitude of the geographic location assigned to the drawing.

Variable.Name: LONGITUDE
Variable.Comment: The longitude of the geographic location assigned to the drawing.

Variable.Name: NORTHDIRECTION
Variable.Comment: Specifies the angle between the Y axis of WCS and the grid north.

Variable.Name: TIMEZONE
Variable.Comment: Sets the time zone for the sun in the drawing.

Variable.Name: LIGHTGLYPHDISPLAY
Variable.Comment: Turns on and off the display of light glyphs.

Variable.Name: CMATERIAL
Variable.Comment: Sets the material of new objects.

Variable.Name: SOLIDHIST
Variable.Comment: Controls whether new composite solids retain a history of their original components.

Variable.Name: SHOWHIST
Variable.Comment: Controls the Show History property for solids in a drawing.

Variable.Name: DWFFRAME
Variable.Comment: Determines whether DWF or DWFx underlay frames are visible or plotted in the current drawing.

Variable.Name: DGNFRAME
Variable.Comment: Determines whether DGN underlay frames are visible or plotted in the current drawing.

Variable.Name: REALWORLDSCALE
Variable.Comment: Drawing is scaled to the real world.

Variable.Name: INTERFERECOLOR
Variable.Comment: Represents the ACI color index of the "interference objects" created during the interfere command.

Variable.Name: INTERFEREOBJVS
Variable.Comment: Hard-pointer ID to the visual stype for interference objects.

Variable.Name: INTERFEREVPVS
Variable.Comment: Hard-pointer ID to the visual styoe for the viewport during interference checking.

Variable.Name: CSHADOW
Variable.Comment: Shadow mode for a 3D object.

Variable.Name: SHADOWPLANELOCATION
Variable.Comment: Location of the ground shadow plane. This is a Z axis ordinate.

Variable.Name: AXISMODE
Variable.Comment: Axis on.

Variable.Name: AXISUNIT
Variable.Comment: Axis X and Y tick spacing.

Variable.Name: FASTZOOM
Variable.Comment: Fast zoom enabled.

Variable.Name: GRIDMODE
Variable.Comment: Grid mode on.

Variable.Name: GRIDUNIT
Variable.Comment: Grid X and Y spacing.

Variable.Name: SNAPANG
Variable.Comment: Snap grid rotation angle.

Variable.Name: SNAPBASE
Variable.Comment: Snap/grid/base point (in UCS).

Variable.Name: SNAPISOPAIR
Variable.Comment: Isometric plane.

Variable.Name: SNAPMODE
Variable.Comment: Snap mode on.

Variable.Name: SNAPSTYLE
Variable.Comment: Snap style.

Variable.Name: SNAPUNIT
Variable.Comment: Snap grid X and Y spacing.

Variable.Name: VIEWCTR
Variable.Comment: XY center of current view on screen.

Variable.Name: VIEWDIR
Variable.Comment: Viewing direction (direction from target in WCS).

Variable.Name: VIEWSIZE
Variable.Comment: Height of view.
